functions.name: arxiv_auto_search
functions.description: Based on user input, search relevant papers on arxiv. This function will not download the papers.

query.description: Related information of the papers that the user wants to find.

top_k_results.description: The most relevant top_k_results article (if there are so many). This is an optional parameter, and default option is 3. This parameter takes effect only when "download" is set true.

functions.name: summary
functions.description: Summarize the content of the paper(in PDF or Word format). The papers should be downloaded before summarized.

path.description: The path of the paper to summarize.
